title: Crime Alert 12.20.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.20.21
description:
A man installs an app on his daughter's iPad to spy on her mother. A greedy bank robber gets caught.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
